awd_titl_txt: Presidential Young Investigators Award: New Directions in   Computational Fluid Dynamics
awd_abstract_narration: This research by a Presidential Young Investigator is focused                   on mixing, turbulence, instabilities, and coherent vortex                       structures in fluid flows.  The principal tool will be                          computational fluid dynamics (CFD), so that the research also                   contains a strong component towards developing accurate and                     efficient computational techniques and computer architectures.                                                                                                  Better and faster methods in CFD will permit the prediction of                  more complex flows, heretofore not simulated but accessible                     only to experiments.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
